phases.name: Foundation & Setup
phases.description: Environment setup, Python mastery, basic DSA

1.title: Foundation & Environment Setup
objectives: Set up complete development environment with AI tools
Install VS Code, Python, Git, and configure Cursor AI
Create Learning Ledger and initialize GitHub repository
Solve first 10 LeetCode easy problems with AI coaching

sessions.title: Environment Setup & Python Basics
sessions.description: Configure development environment, Python fundamentals with AI assistance

sessions.title: Git, GitHub & First LeetCode Problems
sessions.description: Version control mastery and algorithmic problem solving introduction

ai_prompts.text: Help me configure the optimal development environment for ML engineering interviews. Include VS Code extensions, Python setup, and AI coding assistants.
Create a personalized study plan based on my ML background. Identify knowledge gaps and suggest optimal learning sequence for FAANG interviews.

2.title: Week 2 Advanced Training
objectives: Advanced learning objectives with AI enhancement
Company-specific interview preparation
Portfolio project development and optimization
Mock interview practice with AI feedback

sessions.title: Morning Session: Advanced Concepts
sessions.description: Advanced theoretical learning with AI enhancement

sessions.title: Evening Session: Implementation Practice
sessions.description: Advanced practical implementation with AI feedback

ai_prompts.text: Help me solve advanced problems with optimal approaches and detailed analysis.
Provide advanced interview coaching and company-specific guidance.

5.title: Arrays & Hashing Patterns
objectives: Master Arrays & Hashing patterns with AI optimization
Solve 12+ problems with real-time AI feedback
Implement custom hash table with performance analysis
Complete first AI-enhanced mock interview

sessions.title: Array Patterns & Two Pointers
sessions.description: Advanced array manipulation techniques with AI pattern recognition

sessions.title: Hash Tables & Implementation
sessions.description: Hash table design, collision handling, and performance optimization

ai_prompts.text: Explain the optimal approach for this array/hashing problem. Focus on time complexity, space optimization, and common pitfalls to avoid.
Help me identify the underlying pattern in this problem set. Generate similar problems for practice and explain when to apply this pattern.
